channel.title: alter tag on SiriDB documentation
channel.description: Recent content in alter tag on SiriDB documentation

item.title: set name
item.description: Change the name for a tag. Note This statement expects a normal string using single or double quotes. The reason is that ‘set name’ expects a string and not a tag. Example # Rename tag `linux` to `ubuntu` alter tag `linux` set name 'ubuntu'
